Chhayaswori Store

Welcome to Chhayaswori Store

About Us

Chhayaswori Store is your trusted shop located in Newroad, Kathmandu (Bhaisako Tole). We provide a wide range of products and excellent customer service to our community.

All our shops are proudly owned and operated by Mr. Bhim Bahadur Khadka, who has been in business for over 17 years.

Store Highlights

Our shop is known as one of the most affordable stores in Newroad. We proudly operate three branches located in:

  • Newroad
  • Lagankhel
  • Kandaghari

We sell both wholesale and retail at our Lagankhel and Kandaghari branches. However, please note that at our Newroad branch, we currently only sell wholesale.

Our products include both Nepali and Chinese goods. Among Nepali brands, we proudly sell slippers from trusted names like Goldstar, Makalu, and Marin.
